anxiety_exercise <- c(20, 23, 25, 30, 35, 29, 37, 24, 29, 31, 26, 28)
anxiety_no_exercise <- c(24, 35, 41, 21, 38, 23, 37, 44, 32, 33, 34, 42)
shapiro.test(anxiety_exercise)
shapiro.test(anxiety_no_exercise)
t_test_result <- t.test(anxiety_exercise, anxiety_no_exercise,var.equal = TRUE)
print(t_test_result)
mean_diff <- mean(anxiety_no_exercise) - mean(anxiety_exercise)
pooled_sd <- sqrt(((length(anxiety_exercise) - 1) * var(anxiety_exercise) + (length(anxiety_no_exercise) - 1) * var(anxiety_no_exercise)) / (length(anxiety_exercise) + length(anxiety_no_exercise) - 2))
effect_size <- mean_diff / pooled_sd
cat("Cohens-d value:",effect_size, "\n")
cat("Mean (exercise):", mean(anxiety_exercise), "\n")
cat("Mean (no exercise):", mean(anxiety_no_exercise), "\n")
cat("Variance (exercise):", var(anxiety_exercise), "\n")
cat("Variance (no exercise):", var(anxiety_no_exercise), "\n")
cat("Observations (exercise):", length(anxiety_exercise), "\n")
cat("Observations (no exercise):", length(anxiety_no_exercise), "\n")
cat("Pooled Variance:", pooled_sd^2, "\n")
cat("Hypothesized Mean Difference:", t_test_result$null.value, "\n")
cat("Degrees of Freedom:", t_test_result$parameter, "\n")
cat("t Stat:", t_test_result$statistic, "\n")
cat("P(T<=t) one-tail:", t_test_result$p.value / 2, "\n")
cat("t-Critical on one-tail:", qt(0.05, t_test_result$parameter, lower.tail = FALSE), "\n")
cat("P(T<=t) two-tail:", t_test_result$p.value, "\n")
cat("t-critical two-tail:", qt(0.025, t_test_result$parameter, lower.tail = FALSE), "\n")
